title: FlyingCat_93

content: Dear fellow poker enthusiasts,I would like to sell premium poker courses, below the list of poker courses I currently have:- BTS Ultimate High Stakes Course- Guerrilla Poker redline play - Uri Peleg- Upswing - Poker Crush the Baron - Upswing - Postflop Gameplan by Doug Polk- Upswing - Winning Poker Tournaments - Nick Petrangelo- Upswing - ELITE CASH GAME MASTERY by Andres "educa-p0ker" Artinano- NL2 mastery course - Nathan William (aka BlackRain79)- BTS Scrimitzu Microstakes System (BTS)- Charlie - Play & Explain BR challenge (first 72 hours recorded of the challenge)- Charlie - Poker Masterclass for NL2 - NL25 - Overnight Monster - AlvinTeachesPoker- Poker Detox - Ether- Poker Detox - Night Vision- Poker Detox - PIO unlocked- Kanu7 - Advanced cash game course upswing poker- Pokercode - Cash game by Steffan Sontheimer - PokerCode - Lessons GTO by Steffen Sontheimer - Elite Cash Exploits by Uri Peleg on Upswing poker- Carrot Corner Poker - Cash Injection- Carrot Corner Poker - Pio vs Population- Carrot Corner Poker - Poker School Grade 1   - Daniel Negranu Teaches Poker - Masterclass- Phil Ivey - Masterclass- RYE Bencb MTT Masterclass- RYE Bencb MTT Bonus material- RYE - UNCHAINED - A POWERFUL MIND- Run It Once - From the ground up by Peter Clarke- Run it Once - A Game Masterclass by Elliot RoeMining Bases:(literally this is better than any course if you are studying holdem)Hands histories High Stakes Holdem 6-Max NL1000+04.2018-07.2019 // 3.539.518 hands // 3.37GBPlease send me a DM to further discuss details, also we can exchange courses.

Maybe you can reach out to me now, as I have just enabled this setting in my account profile.Could you retry or enable this option?
